SELECT lectureName, detailLink, city, school, address, CONCAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(startTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), ' - '), DATE_FORMAT(endTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')) AS time FROM lecture WHERE deleted = 0
AND lectureName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}), '%')
AND TO_DAYS(startTime) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) >= DATE(startTime) AND DATE(startTime) >= CURDATE()
AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) >= DATE(startTime) AND DATE(startTime) >= CURDATE()
AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) >= DATE(startTime) AND DATE(startTime) >= CURDATE()
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(startTime) AND DATE(startTime) <= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 23 DAY)
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= DATE(startTime) AND DATE(startTime) <=DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
